Package ru.nsu.lebedev.examination

Class Grade

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.nsu.lebedev.examination.Grade
  • public final class Grade
extends java.lang.Object
    Grade class. Represents a grade assigned to a student for a specific subject in a particular semester.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int MAX_VALUE  
      static int MIN_VALUE

      Grade​(int value, int semester, AcademicDiscipline subject)
      Constructs a Grade object with the specified value, semester, and subject.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Grade

        public Grade​(int value,
             int semester,
             AcademicDiscipline subject)
        Constructs a Grade object with the specified value, semester, and subject.
        Parameters:
        value - the grade value (clamped between MIN_VALUE and MAX_VALUE)
        semester - the semester number
        subject - the subject associated with the grade

    • Method Detail

      • getDisciplineType

        public DisciplineType getDisciplineType()
        Gets the type of the discipline associated with this grade.
        Returns:
        the discipline type, which determines the assessment format.

      • isAwardedLaterThan

        public boolean isAwardedLaterThan​(Grade otherGrade)
        Determines if this grade was awarded later than another grade for the same subject.
        Parameters:
        otherGrade - another Grade object
        Returns:
        true if this grade was awarded in a later semester for the same subject

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Provides a string representation of the grade.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string describing the subject, semester, and grade value

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
        Checks if two grades are equivalent based on their semester and subject. Grade values are ignored because two grades for the same semester and subject cannot differ.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - the reference object with which to compare
        Returns:
        true if the objects have the same semester and subject

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Computes a hash code based on the semester and subject.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the hash code

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Retrieves the grade value.
        Returns:
        the numeric grade value

      • getSemester

        public int getSemester()
        Retrieves the semester in which the grade was awarded.
        Returns:
        the semester number

      • getAcademicDiscipline

        public AcademicDiscipline getAcademicDiscipline()
        Retrieves the AcademicDiscipline associated with the grade.
        Returns:
        the AcademicDiscipline object
